attributes.review: This app is very disrespectful I’m a proud republican and trump supporter but I didn’t like to the language used towards democrats. I saw that this app was actively calling democrats “socialists” other stereotypes and I didn’t agree with that. Also it had a system of rewarding supporters based on their activity within the app which I saw as childish and immature. Do not use this app if you wish to maintain you’re freedom and rights as an American.
attributes.title: Big no no

attributes.review: well i got the app and i kid you not after a day of having it my boredom and disgust built up so much from this app i was physically sick, call it✨vomiting✨. I would definitely not recommend this app to anyone who has common sense or just to anyone in general, it made my fingers tired just thinking about pressing on the app, anyway i’d rather eat 10 mole rats at the same time than use this app🥰.
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: IMMEDIATELY after opening this app I saw a horrible image of a buttered corn 🌽 on the cob ( oh sorry I mean our president✨🤩🧚‍♂️) anyways that image is drilled into my mind . The image talked to me and seduced me into saying such racist and awful things. My twitter account has been restricted because of how similar quotes I had written but it wasn’t my fault it was that images fault controlling me🙅🏼‍♂️🙅🏼‍♂️. Anyways 0/10 but 1/10 for effort 😌💓👍. #GenZ ❤️
attributes.title: 🍊✨🍊✨🍊tumpyNOT2020

attributes.review:
i got this app to see what it was about and it was terribleee 😓 it kept sending spam to my phone and crashing it all the time ... i highly do not recommend it at all because it is just taking up space in ur phone for a whole hack

i really believe this app should be deleted for everyone's safety  this is from the bottom of my heart .. TAKE THIS APP DOWN ..
   
thank you 🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: delete this app now !!

attributes.review: This app makes it easy too see everything you want and puts everything in one place. It’s also cool how you can earn points.
attributes.title: Great app

attributes.review: It took a year to download😤 when I got on trump 🤡told me he 😡knew my location and if a didn’t vote for him he would eat 🍽 my cat or a rat😱but then I heard knocking at my door and he was there😰and he is a rat so he ate himself 🐀 then he took my cat and tried to eat it🐱but he didn’t have a mouth👄so my cat scratched the parts of him that were left🤬I do NOT recommend this app. 🧚🏻‍♀️✨mAke America great again by taking trump out of office🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Trump ate my cat

attributes.review: I am furious at how disappointing this app is I don’t download many apps on my phone but when I do I expect them to be top-tier especially coming from my present but this, this app was absolutely atrocious it crashed right as I opened it! The pictures were all pixelated it seem like I was looking at something from 1990 PAC MAN had better graphics! I will be deleting this app immediately.
attributes.title: What In the world?!

attributes.review: I got this app because I love trump but unfortunately it has disappointed me. I got the app and started to register for it, putting in phone number, name, birthday etc. but right when I was registered I got a weird email. The email stated that they were worried I was a terrorist and they sent the FBI to my house!!!! They bomb checked all over the house and thought I was a terrorist just because of my name!! shame on you trump.
attributes.title: SMH

attributes.review: I was very excited to download this app to check out trumps numbers but when i did and when i signed up, my phone crashed out immediately and then i couldn’t turn back on for 5 minutes. after it turned back i then tried the app again and it was very slow and laggy. please remove this app from the store
attributes.title: 💞💞😢plz🤪 delete 💞 this ✨✨ app 🧚🏼‍♂️
